mapper.sql: SID, CLAIM_NO, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, MILL_SHEET_NO, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUST_ADDR, CUST_EMP_NO, CUST_TEL, LAST_USER_ID, LAST_USER, LAST_USER_ADDR, CREATE_EMP_NO, LAST_USER_TEL, LAST_USER_EMAIL, BATTEN_PLATE_NO, DESIGNATION, USED, CONTRACT_NO, CONTRACT_VOLUME, SIZE_MARK, ORIGINAL_WEIGHT, ORDER_NO, ORIGINAL_CAR_NO, CONTRACT_UNIT_PRICE, OBJECTION_NUM, END_PROCESSING_TECH, CLAIM_DESC, CLAIM_REASON, STEEL_TYPE, PRO_PROBLEM, PRO_DETAIL, CLAIM_STATE, FILE_PATH, REJECT_REASON, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION,DISSENTING_UNIT,ADMISSIBILITY_TIME,PRESENTATION_DATE,ADMISSIBILITY_USER,PRESENTATION_USER,REASONS_FOR_COMPULSORY_CLOSURE
mapper.select: SELECT h.* from(SELECT DISTINCT A.MILL_SHEET_NO, (select distinct name1 from MILL_CUSTOMER where KUNNR =B.ZKUNNR) AS ZKUNNR FROM WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_APPLY A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS B ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = B.MILL_SHEET_NO) H WHERE h.ZKUNNR = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT h.* from(SELECT DISTINCT A.MILL_SHEET_NO, (select distinct name1 from MILL_CUSTOMER where KUNNR =B.ZKUNNR) AS ZKUNNR FROM WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_APPLY A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS B ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = B.MILL_SHEET_NO) H WHERE h.ZKUNNR = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_APPLY.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_CLAIM_APPLY (SID, CLAIM_NO, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, MILL_SHEET_NO, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUST_ADDR, CUST_EMP_NO, CUST_TEL, LAST_USER_ID, LAST_USER, LAST_USER_ADDR, CREATE_EMP_NO, LAST_USER_TEL, LAST_USER_EMAIL, BATTEN_PLATE_NO, DESIGNATION, USED, CONTRACT_NO, CONTRACT_VOLUME, SIZE_MARK, ORIGINAL_WEIGHT, ORDER_NO, ORIGINAL_CAR_NO, CONTRACT_UNIT_PRICE, OBJECTION_NUM, END_PROCESSING_TECH, CLAIM_DESC, CLAIM_REASON, STEEL_TYPE, PRO_PROBLEM, PRO_DETAIL, CLAIM_STATE, FILE_PATH, REJECT_REASON, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION,DISSENTING_UNIT,ADMISSIBILITY_TIME, PRESENTATION_DATE,ADMISSIBILITY_USER,PRESENTATION_USER,REASONS_FOR_COMPULSORY_CLOSURE,REPORT_PICTURE,OBJECTION_CONFIRMATION) values (#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUserAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUserTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUserEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{battenPlateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{used,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractVolume,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalCarNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractUnitPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{objectionNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{steelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dissentingUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{admissibilityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{presentationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{admissibilityUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{presentationUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reasonsForCompulsoryClosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reportPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{objectionConfirmation ,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_APPLY.nextval FROM DUAL

mapper.update:
update CRM_CLAIM_APPLY
set version = version + 1,
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ADDR = #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_EMP_NO = #{custEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_TEL = #{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_USER_ID = #{lastUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_USER = #{lastUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_USER_ADDR = #{lastUserAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_EMP_NO = #{createEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_USER_TEL = #{lastUserTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_USER_EMAIL = #{lastUserEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATTEN_PLATE_NO = #{battenPlateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESIGNATION = #{designation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USED = #{used,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_VOLUME = #{contractVolume,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SIZE_MARK = #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_WEIGHT = #{originalWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_CAR_NO = #{originalCarNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_UNIT_PRICE = #{contractUnitPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
OBJECTION_NUM = #{objectionNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
END_PROCESSING_TECH = #{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIM_DESC = #{claimDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIM_REASON = #{claimReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEEL_TYPE = #{steelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_PROBLEM = #{proProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_DETAIL = #{proDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIM_STATE = #{claimState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DISSENTING_UNIT = #{dissentingUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ADMISSIBILITY_TIME = #{admissibilityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRESENTATION_DATE = #{presentationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSING_TIME = #{closingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSING_USER = #{closingUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMISSIBILITY_USER = #{admissibilityUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRESENTATION_USER = #{presentationUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASONS_FOR_COMPULSORY_CLOSURE = #{reasonsForCompulsoryClosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_PICTURE = #{reportPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECTION_CONFIRMATION = #{objectionConfirmation ,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
AUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT nvl( MAX( SUBSTR( claim_No,LENGTH(claim_No),10 )),'000') FROM CRM_CLAIM_APPLY where claim_No like CONCAT('${claimNo}','___')
